item.title: FFXIV
item.description: Did you know that the critically acclaimed MMORPG Final Fantasy XIV has a free trial, and includes the entirety of A Realm Reborn AND the award-winning Heavensward expansion up to level 60 with no restrictions on playtime? Sign up, and enjoy Eorzea today!Â https://secure.square-enix.com/account/app/svc/ffxivregister?lng=en-gb
